data.name: Global Azure Bootcamp Austria 2020
data.description: All around the world user groups and communities will come together from April 23 - April 25, 2020 once again in the seventh Global Azure Bootcamp event. Join us on Friday, April 24, 2020 in Linz.

relatedRecords.name: 4th IEEE-International Conference on Control, Automation and Diagnosis
relatedRecords.description:
The 2020 International Conference on Control, Automation and Diagnosis (ICCAD′20) is the 4th edition in the series of the International Conference on Control, Automation and Diagnosis, organized since 2017.
The First one (ICCAD′17) was held in Hammamet, Tunisia, in January 2017.

relatedRecords.name: building IoT
relatedRecords.description: Die building IoT ist die Fachkonferenz für Entwickler, Architekten und Projektleiter, die Anwendungen und Produkte im Internet der Dinge entwickeln – unabhängig von einer speziellen Branche.
